entry.title: New release for DockSTARTer: v2025.07.23-1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Adjust notices when applying themes by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2038

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/compare/v2025.07.22-2...v2025.07.23-1

entry.title: New release for DockSTARTer: v2025.07.23-2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update references to branch master to main in the docs by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2039
  • Update references to branch master to main in .github folder by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2040

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/compare/v2025.07.23-1...v2025.07.23-2

entry.title: New release for DockSTARTer: v2025.07.23-3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add colors to folders, files and variables in notices by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2041
  • Begin replacing hard-coded CYAN color in notices with pre-defined colors by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2042
  • Create pre-defined colors for notice, warn, etc by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2043
  • Replace the rest of the hard-coded CYAN colors with pre-defined variaâ€¦ by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2044
  • Adjust file, folder and "running command" colors in notices by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2045
  • Change the update notice to a warning by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2046
  • Replace remaining hard-coded color codes in main. by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2047

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/compare/v2025.07.23-2...v2025.07.23-3

entry.title: New release for DockSTARTer: v2025.07.26-1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Change UserCommand notice color from Yellow to Bold Yellow by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2048
  • Change URL notice color from Magenta to Underlined Magenta by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2049
  • Add Bold, Underline, and Bottom of Screen ANSI codes to the ANSI codes to strip by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2051
  • Re-arrange main routine by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2052
  • Fix app_list` test by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2053

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/compare/v2025.07.23-3...v2025.07.26-1

entry.title: New release for DockSTARTer: v2025.07.26-2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Apply theme before running tests so the DC variable is set up. by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2054

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/compare/v2025.07.26-1...v2025.07.26-2
